title: >>> TWO YEARS Later
body_text:
Dodgeball Exposed
-- The main reason behind the absence of the
Hall of Fame
was to prevent hurting anyones' feelings. The last inductions were made way back at DODGEBALL 20 in late December 2005 and to this day, there is little to no mention of the "elite" club.
-- Remember the
PondScum Invasion
at DODGEBALL LX3 last November? As much as PondScum's own Dan Turner and Ray Marzarella were secretly formulating the attack, the self-proclaimed "Creation" John Tronolone perhaps played the biggest role, for it was he that came up with the golden idea.
-- Mike "Sputz" Krott's recent finger fracture did more than just worry his doctor. Despite the concerns and pressure to retire, the legendary general has gone against wishes and orders and passionately partakes to this very day.
--
Dodgeball.livejournal.com
may be the "home" of dodgeball, but the original, unused site can be found
HERE
.
-- The
CREAMation
match is certainly of a kind. In the next couple of months however, the dodgeball world will bare witness to the next "food fight", coined the
Powder Puff
match.
-- It took no effort at all to convince powerhouse Kevin Fitzpatrick to accept his forthcoming
CREAMation
match with rival Chris Adams.
-- And speaking of the eldest Adams, it was he who selected the song "Saturdays"  as one of four DODGEBALL 100 theme songs.
Love Connection: The Couples of Dodgeball
Move over Chuck Woollery! From the duos of yester-year to the loveable couples of the modern era. Dodgeball has unquestionably brought many people together, and the effect can still be seen today.
Gone but Not Forgotten
Dan Spengeman & Kathryn Nogueira
Travis Mills & Lauren Stopa
Tom Adams & Kathryn Nogueira
Present Day
Mike "Sputz" Krott & Melissa Kerr
Justin Pierce & Lauren Stopa
Kevin Fitzpatrick & Valerie Winston*
Mike Butler & Alison Bertsch
Mike Edwards & Sara DeCuir
Chris Adams & Vivienne Doclosen*
*Okay untrue, but the joke has stuck for well over a year.
*Vivienne was a spectator at DODGEBALL 80 as well as other events during the Summer 2007 season, but she has yet to actually participate.
The Two Year MAIN EVENT
Female titans collide when
Lauren Winston
teams with
Diana DiBuccio
to take on
Lauren Stopa
and
Valerie Winston
. The biggest, most anticipated female war in all of dodgeball!
body_html:
Dodgeball Exposed
-- The main reason behind the absence of the Hall of Fame was to prevent hurting anyones' feelings. The last inductions were made way back at DODGEBALL 20 in late December 2005 and to this day, there is little to no mention of the "elite" club.

-- Remember the PondScum Invasion at DODGEBALL LX3 last November? As much as PondScum's own Dan Turner and Ray Marzarella were secretly formulating the attack, the self-proclaimed "Creation" John Tronolone perhaps played the biggest role, for it was he that came up with the golden idea.

-- Mike "Sputz" Krott's recent finger fracture did more than just worry his doctor. Despite the concerns and pressure to retire, the legendary general has gone against wishes and orders and passionately partakes to this very day.

-- Dodgeball.livejournal.com may be the "home" of dodgeball, but the original, unused site can be found HERE.

-- The CREAMation match is certainly of a kind. In the next couple of months however, the dodgeball world will bare witness to the next "food fight", coined the Powder Puff match.

-- It took no effort at all to convince powerhouse Kevin Fitzpatrick to accept his forthcoming CREAMation match with rival Chris Adams.

-- And speaking of the eldest Adams, it was he who selected the song "Saturdays" as one of four DODGEBALL 100 theme songs.

Love Connection: The Couples of Dodgeball
Move over Chuck Woollery! From the duos of yester-year to the loveable couples of the modern era. Dodgeball has unquestionably brought many people together, and the effect can still be seen today.

Gone but Not Forgotten
Dan Spengeman & Kathryn Nogueira
Travis Mills & Lauren Stopa
Tom Adams & Kathryn Nogueira

Present Day
Mike "Sputz" Krott & Melissa Kerr
Justin Pierce & Lauren Stopa
Kevin Fitzpatrick & Valerie Winston*
Mike Butler & Alison Bertsch
Mike Edwards & Sara DeCuir
Chris Adams & Vivienne Doclosen*

*Okay untrue, but the joke has stuck for well over a year.
*Vivienne was a spectator at DODGEBALL 80 as well as other events during the Summer 2007 season, but she has yet to actually participate.

The Two Year MAIN EVENT
Female titans collide when Lauren Winston teams with Diana DiBuccio to take on Lauren Stopa and Valerie Winston. The biggest, most anticipated female war in all of dodgeball!
